message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. My initial offer is $200.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product. I believe a fair price for me would be $150.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the value.  I can come down a bit to $180.  I believe that's a fair reflection of the product's worth.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on this product, I would like to propose a price of $160.
